metadata.title: EduStride - Skill & Digital Portfolio
metadata.description: Integrated education platform to build digital portfolios and skills from high school to postgraduate

emptyState.title: No Data Yet
emptyState.description: You don't have any data yet. Start by creating your first portfolio or adding your skills.

hero.title: Build Your Digital Legacy & Skills for the Future
hero.subtitle: Integrated education platform helping 10K+ Indonesian students from high school to postgraduate build professional portfolios, develop industry-relevant skills, and achieve dream careers.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to succeed at every educational stage

autoPortfolio.title: Auto-Portfolio Generator
autoPortfolio.description: Create professional portfolios automatically from your data and achievements. Save time, maximize results.

smartRoadmap.title: Smart Skill Roadmap
smartRoadmap.description: Personalized skill roadmap based on your education level and career goals. Structured and measurable.

linkedin.title: LinkedIn Integration
linkedin.description: Automatic synchronization with LinkedIn to build a strong personal brand and connect with industry.

levels.title: For Every Level
levels.subtitle: Specially designed for the unique needs of students at every educational stage

sma.name: High School
sma.title: Exploration & Discovery
sma.description: Discover your passion, explore various career paths, and prepare to enter your dream university with confidence.

s1.name: Undergraduate
s1.title: Building Professional Career
s1.description: Build a strong portfolio, land internships at top companies, and start your professional career with a solid foundation.

s2s3.name: Postgraduate
s2s3.title: Academic & Research Excellence
s2s3.description: Manage research publications, build academic branding, and increase your research impact at national and international levels.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become Indonesia's leading education platform that empowers students to build professional digital portfolios and develop skills relevant to 2026 industry needs.

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Provide personalized skill roadmaps for every educational level
Help students build professional and verified digital portfolios
Connect students with internship and career opportunities at top companies
Create a supportive learning community that collaborates for success

personalized.title: Personalized Pathway
personalized.description: Every student is unique. We customize roadmaps based on your level, interests, and career goals with a data-driven approach.

industry.title: Industry-Relevant Skills
industry.description: Curriculum always updated according to current industry needs. Learn skills that companies actually demand.

community.title: Supportive Community
community.description: Join 10K+ students and professionals supporting each other's growth and success together.

landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to succeed at every educational stage
landing.levelsSubtitle: Specially designed for the unique needs of students at every stage
landing.ctaDescription: Join 10K+ students and build a digital portfolio that will open doors to your future.
landing.subtitle: Integrated education platform helping 10K+ Indonesian students build professional portfolios and industry-relevant skills.

login.title: Sign in to EduStride
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue your learning journey

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

register.subtitle: Join to start your learning journey
register.name: Full Name

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Manage your projects, certificates, and experiences
portfolio.noDataDescription: Start by creating your first portfolio to showcase your projects, certificates, and experiences.

form.title: Title
form.tagHint: Press Enter to add a tag
form.featuredDescription: Featured portfolios will appear in the featured section

detail.notFoundDescription: The portfolio you are looking for may have been deleted or does not exist.

skills.title: Skill Hub
skills.description: Manage and track your skill progress
skills.makePublicDescription: Show this skill on your public portfolio
skills.noSkillsDescription: Start adding skills to track your progress

roadmap.title: Skill Roadmap
roadmap.description: Visualize your skill progress by category
roadmap.noData: No skill data to display yet

quiz.title: Quiz & Assessment
quiz.description: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes
quiz.instruction1: Answer all questions by selecting one option
quiz.instruction2: You cannot change answers after submission
quiz.instruction3: Achieve the minimum score to pass the assessment
quiz.question: Question
quiz.scoreDescription: You answered {score}% correctly out of {total} questions
quiz.passedMessage: You've passed this assessment. Keep improving your skills!
quiz.failedMessage: You need {passingScore}% to pass. Try again!

achievements.title: Achievements & Certifications
achievements.description: Manage your achievements, certifications, and awards

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: Manage your professional and organizational experience

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and profile

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.darkModeDesc: Enable dark theme for the app

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.badgesDesc: Get notified when you earn a new badge

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.twoFactorDesc: Add an extra layer of security
privacy.publicProfileDesc: Make your profile visible to others

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Manage your academic documents, certificates, and portfolio

quiz.title: Quiz & Assessment
quiz.description: Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes
quiz.noQuizzesDescription: Start creating quizzes to test your knowledge

quizCreate.title: Create New Quiz
quizCreate.description: Add questions to test your understanding
quizCreate.trueFalseHint: First option will be 'True', second option will be 'False'
quizCreate.noQuestions: No questions yet. Click 'Add Question' to get started.

quizTake.question: Question
quizTake.confirmSubmit: You have unanswered questions. Are you sure you want to submit?

quizResults.title: Quiz Results
quizResults.failedMessage: You didn't pass. The passing score is {passingScore}%.
quizResults.answerReviewDescription: Review your answers and learn from mistakes
